title: Weaponized Compassion
description:
In this video I discuss the aspect of Antichrist that is weaponized compassion. I use the examples of Judas in Scripture and the 2016 film called ‘Silence’ as stark demonstrations of this pattern, that can help us to recognize it in our world today.

========================

Timestamps
00:00:00 - Introduction
00:00:45 - Intro music
00:01:10 - Two aspects of Antichrist
00:03:37 - Judas & weaponized compassion
00:08:09 - The film “Silence”
00:09:55 - Our world today
00:15:43 - How to recognize weaponized compassion
00:18:52 - Outro

========================
